enb_long_title: Fifth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: While some observers were suspicious that Kazakhstan's proposal to add itself to Annex I could create a new source of 'hot air,' others welcomed the move as a first step toward expanding the number of countries with limitation and reduction commitments.
Several participants also felt that systemic inadequacies in the climate regime made it extremely difficult to deal with requests for addition or deletion from the Annexes in a principled manner.
